headline: Discover Financial Services lowered to Hold at Jefferies
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies downgraded Discover Financial Services (NYSE:DFS) to Hold from Buy, citing the imminent close of its acquisition by Capital One (NYSE:COF) on May 18.

headline: Capital One vs. AmEx: Which Credit Card Stock is the Better Pick Now?
summary: Which among the two major credit card players, COF & American Express, is better placed to navigate uncertain macroeconomic conditions? Let's find out.
